When using this technique, steel blades begin to grow from the ground, which rush into the heights in wave-like movements, growing like tree branches, piercing everyone who gets in the way.

== Trivia ==
* This technique is used by a member of the [[Purple Moon Religion]], who caused an explosion in the [[Thunder Rail|train]] where [[Sasuke Uchiha]] and [[Konohamaru Sarutobi]] were traveling.
* Activating this technique requires a short series of  hand seals, but it is unknown which ones.
